description: Impose Mid-Holocene (6 kyr ago) boundary conditions for orbital parameters and the atmospheric concentration of well-mixed greenhouse gases. Run for at least 100 years after spin-up. It is mandatory that the model versions used for the PMIP-CMIP6 experiments are the exactly the same as for the other CMIP6 experiments, in particular the DECK and historical simulations.
rationale: Compare with paleodata the model response to known orbital forcing changes and changes in greenhouse gas concentrations.  Evaluate relationships between changes in mean state and variability.

requirements.description: Run for at least 100 years after spin-up, for use with paleoclimate experiments.
requirements.label: 100yrsAfterSpinUp

requirements.description: Impose Mid-Holocene (6 kyr ago) atmospheric concentrations of well-mixed greenhouse gases.
requirements.keywords: PMIP, WMGHG, well-mixed greenhouse gases, mid-holocene
requirements.label: mid-Holocene WMGHG

requirements.description: Impose astronomical parameters for the mid-holocene (6 kyr ago).
requirements.keywords: PMIP, astronomical parameters, orbital parameters, mid-holocene
requirements.label: mid-Holocene Astronomical Parameters

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model
requirements.label: AOGCM Configuration
